Message.Title: Another Incredible Day In Philadelphia
Message.Msg: When I look at the examples on this board, I am reminded how important it is to get a proper education and have a true reason to exist, besides fighting a lost board war on fake information and genuflecting on tipos. I'm proud just to have one ID, and a home, and a family, and children, and grand children, and an income as a fully tenured Professor, and love and respect in my life. Look how many others base their entire existence on me! That's respect and power. Having earned that I use it wisely. I hope that helps.

Topic.Title: if Ebay aggressivve with PayPay, PayPal could capture 60% of mobile payment space

Message.Msg: You're another nutjob like that guy saying eBay should expand into social and barter. Where did you pull the 60% number from? Uranus? The largest segment of mobile payments are in the app space, people buying smartphone apps and in-app purchases. Completely owned by Google and Apple and there's no way ever, either of those companies will let Paypal stick their dirty fingers into that cash pie.
